name: Statki
description:
Statki is a computer adaptation of paper pen Battleship game. The player and the computer have a 10 by 10 board where five ships are located. One of the ships occupies four tiles, two of the ships occupy three tiles, three of the ships occupy two tiles, four of the ships occupy one tile. The ships can be of any straight or curved shape, as long as all of a ship's tiles are connected by their sides and not connected with the parts of another ship.

The game features four difficulty levels and graphics stylized on classic paper pen view with ships as decorations.
